title: The Lonely CEO
description: What if a na√Øve young woman falls in love with a billionaire playing his game with her?Ella is a young woman brought up in an atmosphere of respect for her as a person. Graham is a billionaire and the head of a huge corporation, a proven conqueror of hearts, who still has not found his love. It would seem that nothing binds them together except the relationship of a leader-subordinate. But Ella does not allow Graham to use himself in his usual corporate intrigues.What will prevail: the cold calculation of the lone wolf or the warmth of her love?INFO: Series intended for the wide range of readers who love romantic stories with "happily now" and "happily even after" ends. Novellas written in "shade-to-black" style and do not contain any graphic sex scenes or filthy language style.
author: Misha Quinn
